column4: hello, i own a thinkpad t61 and have not been able to use the Fn-F7 functionality to switch to projector output (e.g. for doing a presentation)... has anyone here been able to get this to work with gutsy?
i'm using a T60 w/ Gutsy right now.  *maybe* i can help?
not sure if these IBMs are exactly the same
what do you use for presentations?
i am going to do one soon using LaTeX/Beamer, so any document viewer
otherwise i have stuck to powerpoint... i do not like oo impress
oops just realised I can't test it on my setup now
just please tell me you don't read the slides ;-)
have you used your t60 before to do a presentation in gutsy?
uh oh.  unfortunately the little lady is calling, so i have to drop out, but i'm sure someone here can help you?
yes but not with what you have there
yes ask him he may know
